cpl.readme:
[[在线文档|https://tiddlywiki-starter-kit.oeyoews.top/docs/plugins/spoiler-text]]

!! Widget Usage

This is a <$s-t text="Spoiler Text Plugin" />

```html
This is a <$s-t text="Spoiler Text Plugin" />
This is a <$spoiler-text text="Spoiler Text Plugin" />
```

!! Web Component Usage

This is a <s-t text="Spoiler Text Plugin(web Component)" />

```html
This is a <s-t text="Spoiler Text Plugin(web Component)" />
This is a <s-t >Spoiler Text Plugin(web Component)" </s-t>
This is a <spoiler-text >Spoiler Text Plugin(web Component)" </spoiler-text>
```

!! wikitext parser

```html
<*Spoiler Text Example*>
```

!! use transclude(beta)

> need doucle click insteadof click

```html
<$s-t tiddler={{your tiddler}} />
```
